homeHeader.title: From Sponsorship to Settlement, Secure a Smooth Relocation for Your Family in the UAE
homeHeader.description: Struggling to navigate the UAE’s complex visa requirements, tackle housing headaches, and avoid costly compliance pitfalls? At One Nexuz, our expert visa consultants and movers handle the legal, logistical, and lifestyle elements of your transition, empowering you to capitalise on one of the world’s fastest-growing economes, access world-class infrastructure, and settle your loved ones stress-free.

leftSection_5.title: How We Streamline Family Relocation in 5 Steps

items.title: Book an Exhaustive Assessment
items.description: We take the time to assess your family goals, visa needs, and lifestyle expectations to build a custom sponsorship and relocation plan.

items.title: Compile All Necessary Documents
items.description: Next, our experts assist you in preparing the necessary documents, from attestation right down to the final submission.

items.title: Get Tailored Recommendations

items.title: Secure Your Visa & IDs
items.description: Next, we’ll assist you in processing the appropriate family visas, managing ID registration, and delivering your goods from your hometown to the UAE.

items.title: Enjoy Post-Relocation Support
items.description: Once all approvals are in, we offer ongoing support, including renewal assistance, post-move follow-ups, and advice on long-term residency.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Can I sponsor my spouse or parents with a UAE residence visa?
items.answer: Yes, you can sponsor your loved ones, including your partner, children, and parents by ensuring you meet the region’s regulatory requirements. Our expert visa consultants offer free eligibility assessment and end-to-end visa processing support.

items.question: How long does family relocation services take?
items.answer: The relocation process can take anywhere between 1 and 3 weeks, depending on your equipment, availability, and unique relocation requirements.

items.question: What documents do I need to relocate my family to the UAE?
items.answer: You’ll need passport copies, marriage and birth certificates, tenancy contracts, an Emirates ID application, medical checkups, and valid health insurance. Our experts assist you through the entire document checklist and attestation.

items.question: Does One Nexuz assist with last-minute moves?
items.answer: Yes, our expert relocaters offer urgent relocation solutions to handle quick turnarounds in the UAE.

items.question: Do I need to be present in the UAE during the relocation process?
items.answer: Our experts handle all the government back-and-forth, equipment movement, and setup, minimising your time on the ground. You’ll only have to show up at key stages, such as medical tests and biometrics.
